Class ReportQuery

java.lang.Object
server.ReportQuery
public class ReportQuery
extends java.lang.Object
A class that performs queries related to system reports
Author:
Koral Biton,Topaz Eldori

  • Method Details

    • getReport

      public static ReturnCommand getReport​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String reportNme, java.lang.String reportMonth, java.lang.String reportYear, java.lang.String storeName)
      method to execute sql query that return the appropriate report
      Parameters:
      con - connection
      reportNme - - the name of report type that asked to present
      reportMonth - - the month of report type that asked to present
      reportYear - - the year of report type that asked to present
      storeName - - the name of store that asked to present
      Returns:
      String that contain the details of the report

    • generateReport

      public static ReturnCommand generateReport​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String productAmount, java.lang.String itemAmount, java.lang.String productRevenue, java.lang.String itemRevenue, java.lang.String fromStore, java.lang.String date)
      method to execute sql query that generate a report automatically
      Parameters:
      con - connection
      productAmount - - amount of product in order
      itemAmount - - amount of item in order
      productRevenue - -revenue of product in order
      itemRevenue - - revenue of item in order
      fromStore - - The name of the store where the order was placed
      date - - the date of the order was placed
      Returns:
      massage to client

    • getReportByQuarterly1

      public static ReturnCommand getReportByQuarterly1​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String quareterly, java.lang.String year, java.lang.String store)
      method to execute sql query that get report by the selected quarterly
      Parameters:
      con - connection
      quareterly - - the number of the selected quarterly
      year - - the number of the selected year
      store - - the name of the selected store
      Returns:
      arrayList of the reports
